address1.description: The first line of the shop's address

address2.description: The second line of the shop's address

auto_configure_tax_inclusivity.description: Flag indicating if taxes are automatically configured to be inclusive

checkout_api_supported.description: Flag indicating if the shop supports the checkout API

city.description: The city where the shop is located

country.description: The country where the shop is located

country_code.description: The country code of the shop's location

country_name.description: The name of the country where the shop is located

county_taxes.description: Flag indicating if county taxes are applicable

created_at.description: The date and time when the shop was created

customer_email.description: The email address of the shop's customer support

currency.description: The currency used in the shop

enabled_presentment_currencies.description: The list of currencies enabled for presenting prices

eligible_for_card_reader_giveaway.description: Flag indicating if the shop is eligible for a card reader giveaway

eligible_for_payments.description: Flag indicating if the shop is eligible to receive payments

email.description: The email address associated with the shop

finances.description: Financial information related to the shop

force_ssl.description: Flag indicating if SSL is enforced for the shop

google_apps_domain.description: The Google Apps domain associated with the shop

google_apps_login_enabled.description: Flag indicating if Google Apps login is enabled for the shop

has_discounts.description: Flag indicating if the shop offers discounts

has_gift_cards.description: Flag indicating if the shop offers gift cards

has_storefront.description: Flag indicating if the shop has a visible storefront

iana_timezone.description: The IANA timezone of the shop

id.description: The unique identifier of the shop

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the shop's location

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the shop's location

marketing_sms_consent_enabled_at_checkou.description: Flag indicating if SMS marketing consent is enabled at checkout

money_format.description: The format used for displaying money

money_in_emails_format.description: The format used for displaying money in emails

money_with_currency_format.description: The format used for displaying money with currency

money_with_currency_in_emails_format.description: The format used for displaying money with currency in emails

multi_location_enabled.description: Flag indicating if multi-location is enabled for the shop

myshopify_domain.description: The MyShopify domain of the shop

password_enabled.description: Flag indicating if password login is enabled for the shop

phone.description: The phone number associated with the shop

plan_display_name.description: The display name of the plan the shop is on

pre_launch_enabled.description: Flag indicating if pre-launch settings are enabled

cookie_consent_level.description: The level of cookie consent set for the shop

plan_name.description: The name of the plan the shop is on

primary_locale.description: The primary locale set for the shop

primary_location_id.description: The ID of the primary location of the shop

province.description: The province or state where the shop is located

province_code.description: The code representing the province or state of the shop's location

requires_extra_payments_agreement.description: Flag indicating if an extra payments agreement is required

setup_required.description: Flag indicating if setup is required for the shop

source.description: The source of the shop data

taxes_included.description: Flag indicating if taxes are included in prices

tax_shipping.description: Flag indicating if taxes are applicable to shipping

transactional_sms_disabled.description: Flag indicating if transactional SMS is disabled

updated_at.description: The date and time when the shop was last updated

visitor_tracking_consent_preference.description: The visitor tracking consent preference set for the shop

weight_unit.description: The unit used for measuring weight

zip.description: The ZIP or postal code of the shop's location
